description: Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) located in Whitehorse, Yukon has a requirement for the supply and delivery of one (1) new hydraulic service crane with a two/dual continuous function controller for the lower Stikine River facility that serves to lift and lower our fleet boats and gear/supplies up and over a steep embankment to the camp site.
full_summary:
=====================================

### Government Tender Announcement: Request for Proposal

**Reference number:** WS4122198875-Doc4261604675  
**Tender title (English/French):** F1624-245313 - Hydraulic Crane (Hydraulique Crane)  
**Publication date:** 25 October 2023  
**Tender closest date:** **Expired**

### Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services has issued a Request for Proposal for the supply and delivery of one (1) new hydraulic service crane with a two/dual continuous function controller. This crane will be utilized by the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) at the lower Stikine River facility in Whitehorse, Yukon. The purpose of the crane is to lift and lower ships and equipment up and over a steep embankment, providing access to a camp site.

### Tender Details

* **Procurement method:** Open bidding  
* **Contracting entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services  
* **End user entity:** Department of Fisheries and Oceans  
* **Trade agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) 
* **Regions of delivery:** Whitehorse, Yukon 

### Tender Language and Communication

* **Notice type:** Request for Proposal  
* **Procurement category:** Goods and Services (GD)  
* **Selection criteria:** Lowest price  
* **Contact person:** Shaylan Stein - shaylan.stein@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca  
* **Contracting entity & end user addresses:** Refer to following addresses.  

### Tender Documents and Information

* **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17824721
* **Tender description:** 
    * Fully-equipped hydraulic service crane 
    * Dual continuous function controller
    * Installation at the lower Stikine River facility, Whitehorse, Yukon.

The Department of Public Works and Government Services invites qualified suppliers to respond to this Request for Proposal. All responses should be submitted according to the terms and conditions of the notice. 

**Note:** Tender closed on 01 December 2023 at 14:00. No further responses will be accepted. 
=====================================

Please let me know if this response meets your requirements!
